products.query: Canadian Solar 2025 new solar panels specifications efficiency n-type
products.answer: Canadian Solar launches revolutionary TOPHiKu CS7L-550MS (550W) with 22.8% efficiency using advanced N-type TOPCon technology. The new series features 96-cell half-cut design, bifacial gain up to 70%, and 30-year linear warranty guaranteeing 87.0% power output.

sources.title: Canadian Solar TOPHiKu CS7L Series 2025
sources.content: 550W N-type TOPCon modules with 22.8% efficiency, 70% bifacial gain, 30-year warranty

products.query: Canadian Solar TOPHiKu 2025 high efficiency modules pricing
products.answer: Canadian Solar TOPHiKu CS7L-550MS priced at €185 per panel for residential systems, €175 for commercial installations. Features advanced cell interconnection, enhanced temperature coefficient (-0.34%/°C), and PID resistance.

sources.title: Canadian Solar 2025 Pricing Information
sources.content: TOPHiKu CS7L-550MS: €185 residential, €175 commercial, volume discounts available

products.query: Canadian Solar bifacial modules 2025 specifications performance
products.answer: Canadian Solar Bifacial HiKu7 series reaches new performance benchmarks with 72% bifaciality factor, dual-glass construction, and 550W output. Optimized for tracker systems with albedo gains up to 30% in optimal installations.

sources.title: Canadian Solar Bifacial HiKu7 Series 2025
sources.content: 72% bifaciality factor, dual-glass, 550W output, optimized for trackers

specifications: TOPHiKu CS7L-550MS: 550W, 22.8% efficiency, N-type TOPCon, 96-cell half-cut
Temperature coefficient: -0.34%/°C, PID resistance, 30-year linear warranty
Bifacial HiKu7: 72% bifaciality, dual-glass construction, tracker optimized
pricing_updates: Premium pricing for bifacial models: +€15 per panel

Enhanced temperature performance and PID resistance

products.query: REC Group 2025 Alpha Pure-R solar panels specifications efficiency
products.answer: REC Alpha Pure-R series achieves breakthrough 23.6% efficiency with 410W output from HJT (Heterojunction Technology) cells. Features 108 half-cut cells, twin-panel design, and industry-leading 25-year product warranty with 92% power guarantee.

sources.title: REC Alpha Pure-R 2025 Specifications
sources.content: 23.6% efficiency, 410W output, HJT technology, 25-year product warranty, 92% power guarantee

products.query: REC TwinPeak 2025 new n-type modules pricing performance
products.answer: REC TwinPeak 5S series upgraded with N-type technology, delivering 400W at 21.5% efficiency. Priced competitively at €165 per panel with enhanced performance in low-light conditions and superior temperature coefficient of -0.32%/°C.

sources.content: 400W, 21.5% efficiency, N-type cells, €165 pricing, excellent low-light performance

products.answer: Alpha ESS introduces Smile5-HV 13.4kWh system with 97.2% round-trip efficiency and advanced LFP chemistry. Priced at €8,900 including hybrid inverter, features modular design expandable to 26.8kWh and 15-year performance warranty.
